license.question: How does licensing work?
license.answer: Each license is tied to specific machines using hardware fingerprinting. You can activate and deactivate machines from your customer portal.

machines.question: What counts as a machine?
machines.answer: A machine is any Windows computer where you install and activate the software. Virtual machines and physical computers each count as one machine.

invoices.question: What happens if I exceed my invoice limit?
invoices.answer: On the Starter plan, you'll receive a notification when approaching your limit. You can upgrade at any time to continue processing.

refund.question: Is there a refund policy?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refund.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: Yes, you can upgrade at any time from your customer portal. The price difference will be prorated.
